sections.content:
**Thu 29 Jun - Daily Levels Summary**
‎
Yesterday I said the BTC H4 trend was weakening, and that a pullback seemed likely. First target on downside was 29900 equal lows. We got a move down to that level and after taking the liquidity below price reversed and is back above $30k. BTC is stronger than the rest, still. I take a look at higher timeframes on BTC as well, as we approach a monthly, quarterly, and 1H (6 month) close tomorrow midnight.
‎
I then take a quick look at some alts, specifically LINK, BNB, and SOL to show how the alt market is dead. No great interest on the downside or upside, and although random pumps are possible, I wouldn't be overly interested in that side of the market. Summer volatility (lack of).
‎
Watch daily levels now:

**Tue 1 Aug - Daily Levels Summary**
‎
I’m travelling this morning and can’t find a place to record, so this will be a written & charts summary.
‎

Monthly Close
Monthly close on BTC was bearish, with a deviation above range high to almost 32k, but closing below 30k ($29250). Looking across the alt market, most alts are bearish and closed with bearish candles. I’m still firmly bullish on BTC but short term more downside can come. Needs to stay above 27500 to hold the 12/21 EMA bands for the monthly chart.
‎
BTC paths
August and September of pre halving year typically produce a pullback in crypto markets. But for today, it’s important not to over react to the early month dip, as we normally see a wick on both sides of the candle. My expected path is drawn in the image below. I think ultimately we go lower at least one more time over the coming weeks for a shakeout, possibly like we did in June where price got choppy. Everyone is bullish BTC on high timeframe, so the low timeframes can get messy.
‎

Wed 6 Sep - Daily Levels Summary
‎
Covering:
‎

BTC bearish
ETH bearish
SOL bearish
MATIC bearish
Whole market looks like dogshit and is bearish
‎
Important! When it looks this bad, sometimes it can squeeze higher and frustrate shorts. Don't get aggressively short, stick to your systems and always manage risk. Best play is probably to do nothing and wait for better opportunities.
‎
No single day matters, unless YOU make it (by getting rekt)
‎‎
LFG 🚀
